mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chapter_application (id, tag_id, alumni_id, status, apply_time, review_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{tagId}, #{alumniId}, #{status}, #{applyTime}, #{reviewTime})
mapper.select: SELECT ca.id, ca.tag_id, ca.alumni_id, ca.status, ca.apply_time, ca.review_time, t.name AS branch_name, a.chinese_name AS applicant_name, c.alumni_id AS creator_id, creator.chinese_name AS creator_name FROM chapter_application ca LEFT JOIN tag t ON ca.tag_id = t.id LEFT JOIN alumnus a ON ca.alumni_id = a.alumni_id LEFT JOIN chapter c ON ca.tag_id = c.tag_id LEFT JOIN alumnus creator ON c.alumni_id = creator.alumni_id ORDER BY ca.apply_time DESC
